üèÅ Script executed:

```shell
#!/bin/bash
# Check that every locale has identical action-group keys for buttPlay
fd buttPlay.json src/locales | while read f; do
  jq -r '.actions | keys | @tsv' "$f" | sort -u > "/tmp/$(basename "$f").keys"
```

Let‚Äôs re-verify parity with a more robust script:

---

üèÅ Script executed:

```shell
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# 1. Gather all buttPlay.json files under src/locales
files=$(fd 'buttPlay\.json$' src/locales)

# 2. Use the first file as the reference
first_file=$(echo "$files" | head -n1)
echo "Using reference: $first_file"

# 3. Extract and sort its action-group keys
```
